props.name: children
props.docblock: specifies the ListBoxOption component(s) that will be displayed within the ListBox element. You can pass in one or more ListBoxOption components.

description.text: specifies the ListBoxOption component(s) that will be displayed within the ListBox element. You can pass in one or more ListBoxOption components.

props.name: className
props.docblock: specifies Bootstrap class names to apply to the ListBox component. The default is an empty string.

description.text: specifies Bootstrap class names to apply to the ListBox component. The default is an empty string.

props.name: selectedOptionIndex
props.docblock: Although the ListBox component keeps track of which ListBoxOption is selected, `selectedOptionIndex` provides a mechanism for an override, if necessary. An example would be to clear the selectedOption when moving between views. Note that override is not permanent and that clicking on a ListBoxOption or interacting with the ListBox with the keyboard will change the selected ListBoxOption relative to the original override. The default is undefined.

description.text: Although the ListBox component keeps track of which ListBoxOption is selected, `selectedOptionIndex` provides a mechanism for an override, if necessary. An example would be to clear the selectedOption when moving between views. Note that override is not permanent and that clicking on a ListBoxOption or interacting with the ListBox with the keyboard will change the selected ListBoxOption relative to the original override. The default is undefined.

props.name: tag
props.docblock: used to specify the element type of the rendered ListBox component. The default is div. Example alternatives include ol, ul, span, etc.

description.text: used to specify the element type of the rendered ListBox component. The default is div. Example alternatives include ol, ul, span, etc.

frontmatter.title: ListBox
frontmatter.notes: Not used anywhere in code on Github. Consult design.
